content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position (106.5, -32.5)) and connected pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (105.5, -32.5), (105.5, -31.5), (106.5, -31.5)

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)) and connected pipes at positions (109.5, -33.5), (110.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (109.5, -31.5), (109.5, -30.5) and a small electric pole at position (111.5, -30.5)

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using connect_entities function
  - Ensure that the positions passed to the function are integers, not floats.
  - Check that the positions are valid and the entities can be connected.
* Errors when accessing attributes of Position objects
  - Make sure to access the attributes correctly, as Position objects do not have a 'position' attribute.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* Important variables:
  - offshore_pump: Position object representing the offshore pump entity
  - boiler: Position object representing the boiler entity
  - Prototype.Pipe: Prototype object representing the pipe entity
  - water_pipes: variable to store the result of the connect_entities function (not successfully assigned due to errors)
